Class BAStateToElementTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.automata.io.out.states.StateToElementTrasformer

    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class BAStateToElementTransformer
extends StateToElementTrasformer
implements Transformer<State,Element>
    Transforms a State of a BA into the corresponding XML element

    Claudio Menghi

        creates a new state transformer

        automaton - is the Buchi automaton containing the state

        public Element transform(State input)
        transforms the state into the corresponding element
        Specified by:
        transform in interface Transformer<State,Element>
        Overrides:
        transform in class StateToElementTrasformer
        Parameters:
        input - is the state to be transformed
        Returns:
        the object of type O which corresponds to the input
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the state to be transformed is null
